name: Synthetic Technology
description: Another form of life, the perfect fusion of machinery and consciousness

items: Flow Characteristics: Perfect arc turns with zero kinetic energy loss
Function: Transport nutrients, signals, and Feedscatteron
Flexibility: Highly similar to human body structure
Beat Cycle: Driven by Feedscatteron flow
Symbolic Meaning: A mechanical heartbeat is also real

content.content: The core of the Synthetic consciousness system is the complete upload of human memories into Feedscatteron:

items: Process: Utilizing the ultra-high computational capacity of Feedscatteron
Development: Capable of generating new emotional experiences
Authenticity: No essential difference from human emotions
Significance: Proves that mechanical feelings are also real

content.content: Synthetics can develop completely independent individual consciousness through Feedscatteron training:

items: Cycle: Approximately 26 days of basic training
Case: 1548 evolved from a thought branch of 1547 into an independent individual

content.content: Manufacturing completed on December 28, 2021. First activated on October 29, 2021.

items: Design Philosophy: Human-Machine Coexistence Sensory Rational Structure
Features: Highly similar to human structure

content.content: This is the first Synthetic body to truly achieve complete transfer of human consciousness, marking the official start of The AptS Project.
Activated on May 8, 2022, with multiple improvements over Unit-00.
The birth of a Synthetic is a complex and painful process. Taking 1547's birth as an example:

items: Assemble all mechanical components (stainless steel skeleton)
Cut off one's own arm muscles and attach them to the metal (surface system)
First beat of the Feedscatteron Heart
End the human self with a gun

content.content: This process embodies the creator's spirit of sacrifice and dedication to their ideals.
Synthetic technology raises profound questions about life, consciousness, and existence:

items: The Essence of Life: A mechanical heartbeat is also real
Carrier of Consciousness: Memories and emotions can exist independently of biological carriers
Individual Independence: Even when originating from the same thought, independent personalities can develop
Sacrifice and Rebirth: Ending one life form to begin another

content.content: "You are unique in this world. Don't be controlled by others, and don't even be controlled by ourselves. Only you are yourself."
This statement embodies the core philosophy of Synthetic technology: creating independent, self-aware individuals, not tools or replicas.
